title: Multimedia-Integrated Instructional Design for Cross-Platform Science Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Scientific Theories, Practical Experience, and Digital Device Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: Practice-centered education utilizing diverse digital platforms in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can design multimedia learning materials integrating science content in cross-platform environments.
Learners can develop and apply instructional strategies utilizing diverse digital platforms (videos, simulations, interactive web tools, etc.).
Learners can produce and submit educational solutions combining science concept delivery and technology integration through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
